nodes.text: Tyrral was a male Chiss merchant who lived on Station Gamma, a space station inside of Ord Mantell Space, after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War fought between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire. His shop was known as Tyrral's Mercantile, and he sold items such as stimpacks and Tatooine bug juice to spacers who came to the station from the nearby Tansarii Point Station. Tyrral frequently wore a red cloak, a green-gemmed necklace, dark brown gloves, and high-collared brown robes held fast by a large piece of metal around his abdomen. He had blue skin, red eyes, and brown-colored hair.

Tyrral was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. Tyrral was added to the game in 2005 as a vendor on Station Gamma, one of the tutorial areas added for new players as part of the New Game Enhancements.
